question: List the names of all faculty members and their department names.
query: SELECT T1.fac_name, T2.dept_name FROM faculty AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_id  =  T2.dept_id

question: How many publications does each faculty member have? List their name and the count.
query: SELECT T2.fac_name, count(*) FROM publication AS T1 JOIN faculty AS T2 ON T1.fac_id  =  T2.fac_id GROUP BY T1.fac_id

question: What are the departments with more than 1 faculty member?
query: SELECT T2.dept_name FROM faculty AS T1 JOIN department AS T2 ON T1.dept_id  =  T2.dept_id GROUP BY T1.dept_id HAVING count(*)  >  1

question: Find the titles of publications published in the year 2010.
query: SELECT title FROM publication WHERE year  =  2010
